mapper.select: SELECT t.id, DATE_FORMAT(t.log_dt,"%Y-%m-%d %T") logDt, t.nr nr, t.description description, t.field, t.code, t.pk_value pkValue, t.channel_id channelId FROM kettle_error_log t where t.channel_id=#{channel_id}

SELECT log.id_batch id, m.task_name transname, log.logdate logdate, log.log_field log_field, log.errors FROM kettle_log log, data_etl_task m WHERE log.transname = m.task_id AND m.task_id =#{taskId} ORDER BY log.logdate DESC LIMIT 1
